<template>
    <Line id="my-chart-id" :options="chartOptions" :data="chartData1"/>
    <Line id="my-chart-id" :options="chartOptions" :data="chartData2"/>
</template>

<script>
    import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'
    import 'chart.js/auto'

    export default {
        // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
        name: "Chart",
        // props: ["display"],
        components: { Line },
        data() {
            return {
                chartData1: {
                    labels: [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March'],
                    backgroundColor: '#f87979',
                    datasets: [ { data: [40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12] } ]
                },
                chartData2: {
                    labels: [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March', 'January', 'February', 'March'],
                    backgroundColor: '#f87979',
                    datasets: [ { data: [40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12, 40, 20, 12] } ]
                },
                chartOptions: {
                    responsive: true
                }
            }
        }
    }
</script>
